mapper.select: SELECT /* com.plgrim.ncp.base.selectSysAdminChrgJob Generator(Generator) 2018-05-23 */ ADMIN_ID , CHRG_JOB_TP_CD , REGTR_ID , REG_DT , UDTER_ID , UDT_DT FROM SYS_ADMIN_CHRG_JOB WHERE 1 = 1 AND ADMIN_ID = #{adminId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND CHRG_JOB_TP_CD = #{chrgJobTpCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
